name: Aspediens
overview:
Aspediens is a company founded in 2004, Partner of Service-now.com in Europe since 2007. With offices in Paris, Geneva and Zurich, Aspediens covers Continental Europe.

The company is exclusively dedicated in selling and implementing Service-now.com. With over 40 years of combined practice in managing IT shops, Aspediens brings a pragmatic approach of ITIL best practices based on “hands-on” experience.

Their rollout methodology is tuned for Service-now.com implementations. It is simple and pragmatic and allows rolling out Service-now.com quickly and efficiently.

Strategically their mission is to help you with your IT Service Management journey including the following areas:

  1. Discover â€¢ Business Service and IT infrastructure definition and discovery
  2. Deliver â€¢ Definition and implementation of Service Catalog
  3. Monitor â€¢ Service level definition, monitoring and event generation
  4. Support â€¢ Implementation of Incident, problem and change management processes
  5. Analyze & Optimize â€¢ Reporting & Analytics

All Aspediens employees have relevant background in ITIL best practices, customer care management and Enterprise tools.
